title: RS21689
content: Federal pay adjustment rates going into effect in January 2004, under Executive Order13322 (69 Federal Register231) were less than those in the pending Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2004 (H.R. 2673). The GeneralSchedule (GS) and related salarysystems were limited to 2.0%, as opposed to the 4.1% subsequently passed. Salaries of officials in the threebranches were temporarily limited, due to the lowerGS rate, to 1.5%, rather than the scheduled 2.2%, which upon Presidential approval of H.R. 2673, will go into effectretroactively.
